Container.Name: Bookshelf-Traveller
Container.Overview:
A simple discord bot that allows you to listen to your audiobooks and manage your audiobookshelf (ABS) server. This requires an AudioBookShelf server token and a discord application token.
For the full guide, please visit the bookshelf-traveller repository.

Config.Name: Bookshelf Token
Config.Description: ABS Token, generated in the settings page of the user. Accepts all user types, but will have limitations if not admin.

Config.Name: Owner Only
Config.Description: Only the owner will have access to all commands. Disable to allow others to use the bot.

Config.Name: Playback Role
Config.Description: Playback Role. Can be copied over from discord when developer mode is enabled.

Config.Name: Multi-User
Config.Description: Enables multi-user login to ABS server. Disable to allow admin controls.

Config.Name: HTTPS Image URL
Config.Description: Used if you want to use HTTPS connection to retrieve your images. Note this won't do anything if you are already using it in the primary URL.
